title: 100-Year-Old Woman Shares Her Secret To Longevity
teaser: Host Jeremy Hobson traveled to his hometown of Urbana, Illinois, for the 100th birthday of a family friend, Betty Esser.
contentencoded:
Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson is broadcasting from his hometown of Urbana, Illinois, today. He traveled there for the 100th birthday of a family friend, Betty Esser.

Jeremy visits her home to speak with her and her daughter, Kay Evans, about the milestone — and her secrets to longevity.

Betty tells Jeremy, “I try not to get upset about things and I think I’m sort of easygoing. I don’t let things disturb me.”

Guests

  • Betty Esser, Urbana resident who just turned 100.
  • Kay Evans, daughter of Betty Esser.
